main.pieces

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.pieces.Piece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, Empty, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by alecsiikaluoma on 18.9.2018. Represents the piece in abstract.

    • Method Detail

      • createMove

        public Move createMove(Board b,
                       int toX,
                       int toY)
        Easier way to create a new move.
        Parameters:
        b - Current board.
        toX - Where to move in x-axis.
        toY - Where to move in y-axis.
        Returns:
        Returns the new move.

      • getColor

        public boolean getColor()

      • hasSameColor

        public boolean hasSameColor(Board b,
                            Move move)
        Checks if this piece has the same color as the target square of the move. Target square can also be empty and its color is represented by false like black color. This methods has to be used in comparing colors to avoid confusion between black piece and empty square.
        Parameters:
        b - Current board.
        move - Move to be performed to get piece to target square.
        Returns:
        True if colors match and false otherwise.

      • clone

        public Piece clone()
        Clones the piece by creating a copy by calling the constructor with the piece.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Copy of this piece.

      • checkIfLegalMove

        public boolean checkIfLegalMove(Board b,
                                Move m)
        Checks if the move is for this piece legal.
        Parameters:
        b - Current position.
        m - The move to be performed.
        Returns:
        True if legal and false otherwise.

      • generateAllLegalMoves

        public abstract ArrayList<Move> generateAllLegalMoves(Board board)
        Generates all legal moves for a given piece. It doesn't check if it creates a check.
        Returns:
        all legal moves according to chess piece movement rules.
